electricClaw.name: Static Shield
electricClaw.description: Surround yourself in electricity to block attacks. (Starter)

electricClaw.name: Thunder Slash
electricClaw.description: Slash with electrified claws, dealing significant damage.

electricClaw.name: Ion Surge
electricClaw.description: A burst of energy that damages and briefly stuns.

electricClaw.name: Shock Drain
electricClaw.description: Strike with electrified claws that drain health from your opponent.

electricClaw.name: Overvolt Rampage
electricClaw.description: A reckless surge of lightning that deals massive damage but also hurts the user due to recoil.

electricClaw.name: Storm Guard
electricClaw.description: Create a high-voltage shield that greatly reduces damage for a short duration.

electricClaw.name: Lightning Infusion
electricClaw.description: Charge your claws with intense lightning, boosting attack power temporarily.

electricClaw.name: Electric Rush
electricClaw.description: Supercharge your movement speed with an electric burst.

electricClaw.name: Pulse Heal
electricClaw.description: Release controlled electric pulses to stimulate rapid healing.

fishmanKarate.name: Water Punch
fishmanKarate.description: A fast jab using water pressure. (Starter)

fishmanKarate.name: Aqua Guard
fishmanKarate.description: Use water to cushion incoming blows. (Starter)

fishmanKarate.name: Jet Stream Fist
fishmanKarate.description: A powerful pressurized punch like a water jet.

fishmanKarate.name: Ocean’s Wrath
fishmanKarate.description: A devastating tidal strike that crushes opponents, but leaves the user weakened from recoil.

fishmanKarate.name: Wave Heal
fishmanKarate.description: Use flowing water energy to mend wounds.

fishmanKarate.name: Coral Armor
fishmanKarate.description: Summon hardened coral to shield yourself.

fishmanKarate.name: Current Boost
fishmanKarate.description: Ride the currents to greatly enhance movement speed.

fishmanKarate.name: Pressure Fist
fishmanKarate.description: A high-pressure blow that deals heavy damage with minor recoil.

fishmanKarate.name: Water Spirit Focus
fishmanKarate.description: Channel the spirit of the sea to temporarily boost attack power.

fishmanKarate.name: Bubble Barrier
fishmanKarate.description: Encase yourself in a bubble layer that absorbs damage.

fishmanKarate.name: Jet Absorb
fishmanKarate.description: Strike with jet fast fists health drain

mechanics.name: Wrench Swing
mechanics.description: A simple swing with a mechanical tool. (Starter)

mechanics.name: Armor Plate
mechanics.description: Activate a metal plating that reduces incoming damage. (Starter)

mechanics.name: Gear Grind
mechanics.description: Spin gears around opponent, slicing them.

mechanics.name: Hydraulic Smash
mechanics.description: Bring down a hydraulic arm with immense force, damaging both enemy and user due to recoil.

mechanics.name: Wrench Drain
mechanics.description: Swing a charged wrench that siphons health from the opponent.

mechanics.name: Repair Mode
mechanics.description: Self-repair mechanical parts to restore health.

mechanics.name: Turbo Charge
mechanics.description: Overload the engine to drastically increase movement speed temporarily.

mechanics.name: Steel Barricade
mechanics.description: Deploy a reinforced steel barrier to block attacks.

mechanics.name: Overclock Strike
mechanics.description: A fully overclocked punch that deals massive damage but causes severe recoil damage.

mechanics.name: Lubricant Boost
mechanics.description: Reduce friction in all moving parts, greatly increasing attack power.

hands.name: Cover Block
hands.description: Raise guard to block incoming strikes. (Starter)

hands.name: Flash Strike
hands.description: A lightning-fast jab that hits twice.

hands.name: Iron Rush
hands.description: Simulate a surge of iron that increases your offense.

hands.name: Regeneration Guard
hands.description: Brace yourself and focus to heal minor wounds.

hands.name: Adrenaline Burst
hands.description: Flood your body with adrenaline to increase speed.

hands.name: Bone Breaker
hands.description: A reckless, bone-crushing punch that also injures the user from recoil.

hands.name: Interrogate
hands.description: Strike fear in your enemies, heals you with lifesteal

hands.name: Steel Guard
hands.description: Harden your stance to block even heavy attacks.

hands.name: Critical Blow
hands.description: A precision strike aimed at vital points, dealing huge damage but with significant recoil.

mera.name: Fire Fist
mera.description: Launch a massive fist-shaped burst of fire that burns everything in its path.

mera.name: Flame Pillar
mera.description: Create a towering column of fire to engulf enemies.

mera.name: Blazing Armor
mera.description: Surround yourself in flames to burn attackers on contact and reduce damage.

mera.name: Inferno Burst
mera.description: Unleash a massive explosion of fire, damaging both foes and self.

mera.name: Flame Regeneration
mera.description: Use the heat to cauterize wounds and restore vitality.

mera.name: Solar Flare
mera.description: Channel intense solar energy to increase attack power.

mera.name: Wildfire Wave
mera.description: Send a sweeping wave of fire across the battlefield.

mera.name: Heat Mirage
mera.description: Use intense heat distortion to make yourself harder to target.

gomu.name: Gear Second
gomu.description: Pump blood rapidly to enhance speed and strength, giving a temporary battle boost.

gomu.name: Gear Third
gomu.description: Inflate your bones to deliver massive blows with gigantic limbs.

gomu.name: Gear Fourth: Boundman
gomu.description: Enhance elasticity and muscle compression for explosive power and speed.

gomu.name: Gear Fourth: Snakeman
gomu.description: Increase attack speed and unpredictability, perfect for overwhelming opponents.

gomu.name: Gear Fifth
gomu.description: Awaken the true power of the fruit, turning the environment into rubber and fighting with cartoon-like freedom.

hie.name: Ice Age
hie.description: Freeze an area instantly with overwhelming cold — a massive, slow-moving blast.

hie.name: Ice Cutter
hie.description: Launch razor-sharp shards of ice in a quick volley.

hie.name: Frost Wall
hie.description: Summon a thick vertical wall of ice to block incoming attacks.

hie.name: Glacial Lance
hie.description: Form a concentrated spear of ice and drive it through the enemy.

hie.name: Permafrost Aegis
hie.description: Encase yourself in layered ice armor that absorbs heavy damage.

hie.name: Frozen Edge
hie.description: Infuse your strikes with crystalline cold to boost attack power temporarily.

hie.name: Froststep
hie.description: Move across the battlefield on sheets of ice, greatly increasing speed.

hie.name: Absolute Zero Blast
hie.description: Release a concentrated pulse of subzero air that numbs and damages everything in front of you.

gura.name: Tremor Fist
gura.description: Strike that sends localized tremors through the ground. (Starter)

gura.name: Tremor Guard
gura.description: Use vibration to disperse and soften incoming hits. (Starter)

gura.name: Quake Wave
gura.description: Send a wide-ranged shockwave that topples opponents.

gura.name: Ground Shatter
gura.description: A cataclysmic stomp that cracks the earth and deals devastating damage at cost to the user.

gura.name: Aftershock Shield
gura.description: Generate persistent vibrations around you that reduce incoming damage.

gura.name: Rumble Charge
gura.description: Channel tectonic force into your strikes, drastically increasing damage.

gura.name: Faultline Slam
gura.description: Open a fissure beneath the enemy, dealing heavy single-target damage.

gura.name: Seismic Bastion
gura.description: Harden your stance with earthquake energy to greatly boost defense for a short time.

kage.name: Shadow Jab
kage.description: A quick, sneaking strike launched from the shadows. (Starter)

kage.name: Shade Veil
kage.description: Wrap yourself in shadow to reduce incoming damage and obscure movement. (Starter)

kage.name: Phantom Strike
kage.description: Converging shadow blades hit from multiple angles in a single assault.

kage.name: Shadow Drain
kage.description: Sink a shadow tendril into the foe to siphon health and restore the user.

kage.name: Eclipse Burst
kage.description: Blanket the area in blackness and strike with condensed shadow force, but it strains the user.

kage.name: Umbra Guard
kage.description: Solidify surrounding shadows into a protective barrier.

kage.name: Night Stalker
kage.description: Move like a silhouette through the battlefield, greatly increasing speed and strike timing.

kage.name: Dark Empowerment
kage.description: Draw on concentrated shadow energy to temporarily boost attack potency.

ope.name: Scalpel Jab
ope.description: A precise surgical strike using Room's edge. (Starter)

ope.name: Aura Guard
ope.description: Create a surgical barrier that reduces incoming damage. (Starter)

ope.name: Spatial Rend
ope.description: Slice space inside the Room to deliver a sudden cut.

ope.name: Shambles
ope.description: Rearrange positions to gain a burst of mobility for a short time.

ope.name: Counter Suture
ope.description: Strike and draw a portion of the foe's life to mend your wounds.

ope.name: Operation Mend
ope.description: Perform a controlled surgical heal to restore a substantial amount of HP.

ope.name: Dissecting Field
ope.description: Open many micro-cuts across the enemy — powerful but tiring.

ope.name: Miracle Boost
ope.description: Temporarily augment attack potency with surgical precision.

magu.name: Seared Jab
magu.description: A molten punch that scars armor and flesh. (Starter)

magu.name: Lava Shell
magu.description: Harden a magma coating that soaks up incoming blows. (Starter)

magu.name: Magma Fist
magu.description: Deliver explosive molten strikes to burn through defenses.

magu.name: Volcanic Surge
magu.description: Erupt the ground beneath foes — devastating but punishing to user.

magu.name: Pyroclast Guard
magu.description: Form a molten barrier that reduces heavy hits.

magu.name: Magma Flow
magu.description: Channel magma power through strikes to increase damage.

magu.name: Seared Grasp
magu.description: Clutch the enemy with molten hands and siphon warmth as life.

magu.name: Eternal Embers
magu.description: Heat your muscles to act faster for a short window.

rumble.name: Static Cage
rumble.description: Surround yourself with static to dampen incoming hits. (Starter)

rumble.name: Thunderbolt
rumble.description: Call down a focused bolt of lightning to strike a target.

rumble.name: Electro Drain
rumble.description: Drain electrical essence from the foe to recover health.

rumble.name: Lightning Dash
rumble.description: Move as a streak of lightning to close gaps and evade.

rumble.name: Chain Shock
rumble.description: Unleash chained arcs that hit multiple targets but strain you.

rumble.name: Thunder God
rumble.description: Transform into a living storm, vastly bolstering defenses.

rumble.name: Ion Field
rumble.description: Generate an ionic barrier that reduces damage taken.

zushi.name: Gravity Well
zushi.description: Create a localized gravity spike that crushes targets.

zushi.name: Falling Star
zushi.description: Summon concentrated gravitational force to slam enemies down.

zushi.name: Titan Pull
zushi.description: Drag foes toward a single point, leaving them vulnerable.

zushi.name: Anchor Weight
zushi.description: Increase your effective weight to resist throws and stuns.

zushi.name: Grounded Fortitude
zushi.description: Harden your body by amplifying gravity on yourself.

zushi.name: Vertical Shift
zushi.description: Manipulate vertical gravity to boost attack impact.

zushi.name: Meteor Draw
zushi.description: Call down multiple heavy impacts that batter an area.

zushi.name: Gravity Anchor
zushi.description: Plant an invisible gravity anchor that reduces incoming damage.

thundergod.name: Thunder Strike
thundergod.description: Concentrated godly lightning that shatters defenses.

thundergod.name: Thunder Drums
thundergod.description: A colossal thunder roar that ripples with raw power.

thundergod.name: Storm Aegis
thundergod.description: Summon a divine lightning shield that soaks tremendous damage.

thundergod.name: Heavenly Electrocution
thundergod.description: Strike with heavenly currents that siphon a large portion of life.

thundergod.name: Divine Surge
thundergod.description: Channel divine storm energy to massively increase attack power.

thundergod.name: Skyfall Cataclysm
thundergod.description: Summon a cataclysmic thunderfall — near-unstoppable but punishing.

thundergod.name: Thunder Mend
thundergod.description: Use restorative storm energy to recover a large amount of HP.

thundergod.name: Divine Parry
thundergod.description: Parry with godly lightning, greatly reducing the next incoming strike.

gear2.name: Jet Pistol
gear2.description: A lightning-fast punch delivered with enhanced speed and power.

gear2.name: Jet Bazooka
gear2.description: Two powerful fists slam forward like a cannon blast, knocking back foes.

gear2.name: Jet Pump
gear2.description: Increase movement speed drastically for quick evasions or fast strikes.

gear2.name: Jet Whip
gear2.description: Stretch your arm at high velocity to sweep enemies across the battlefield.

gear3.name: Gigant Pistol
gear3.description: Deliver a massive enlarged fist strike that crushes anything in its path.

gear3.name: Gigant Shield
gear3.description: Use an enlarged arm to block incoming attacks and protect allies.

gear3.name: Gigant Slam
gear3.description: Leap high and slam a gigantic limb into the ground, causing a shockwave.

gear3.name: Elephant
gear3.description: Harden enlarged limbs to drastically increase defense.

gear3.name: Gigant Gatling
gear3.description: Unleash a barrage of enormous punches in rapid succession.

boundman.name: Leo Bazooka
boundman.description: A brutal burst of compressed muscle/headbutt-like impact.

boundman.name: Compressed Shell
boundman.description: Harden and compress your body to greatly reduce damage.

boundman.name: Titan Compression
boundman.description: Channel compression & Haki to massively boost attack.

snakeman.name: King Cobra
snakeman.description: A flurry of whip-like punches that change direction mid-flight.

snakeman.name: Python Fang
snakeman.description: A series of snapping, curved strikes.

snakeman.name: Slither Guard
snakeman.description: Flow like a snake to minimize damage..

snakeman.name: Serpent Surge
snakeman.description: Sharpen reflexes and launch with unpredictable motion.

snakeman.name: Coiling Strike
snakeman.description: Concentrate twisting power into the next blow.

gear5.name: Drums of Liberation
gear5.description: Beat the awakening drums to restore vitality.

gear5.name: Bajrang Gun
gear5.description: A colossal, Haki-infused punch size of an island.

gear5.name: Kaminari
gear5.description: A blinding, electrified flurry of rubber.

gear5.name: Gigant
gear5.description: Enlarge and harden limbs into an enormous shield

gear5.name: Sunlit Siphon
gear5.description: A radiant, rubbery embrace that rips vitality from the foe

gear5.name: Liberation
gear5.description: Channel Gear 5's freedom to massively amplify attack.

asura.name: Ashura: Ichibugin
asura.description: A single, concentrated multi-sword strike delivered with overwhelming force.

asura.name: Ashura: Makyusen
asura.description: A furious, multi-angle barrage of slashes from the Asura blades.

asura.name: Ashura Bakkei: Moja no Tawamure
asura.description: A devastating Haki-charged finishing technique; incredibly destructive but taxing.

asura.name: Asura Haki Surge
asura.description: Temporarily infuse blades with powerful Haki, massively increasing attack output.

asura.name: Nine-Sword Roar
asura.description: A sweeping defensive slash that hardens stance and repels incoming strikes.

rokushiki.name: Geppo
rokushiki.description: Kick the air to to propel yourself

rokushiki.name: Rankyaku
rokushiki.description: Slice the air to create a sharp flying blade.

rokushiki.name: Kami-e
rokushiki.description: Relax and flow like paper to increase speed.

ace.name: Final Resort
ace.description: Lunge towards the enemy as a final resort.

ace.name: Divine Departure
ace.description: Send a sweeping wave of supreme haki.

yoru.name: Abyssal Edge
yoru.description: A single, world-shattering slash that cleaves through armor.

yoru.name: Nightfall Slash
yoru.description: A rapid, precise cut infused with haki to pierce defenses.

yoru.name: Void Cleaver
yoru.description: Unleash the sword's full might in a devastating arc.

ittoryu.name: Shishi Sonson
ittoryu.description: A lightning-fast iai slash — Zoro's iconic Lion's Song.

ittoryu.name: Iai: Taka Nami
ittoryu.description: A swift draw-and-cut that slices through defenses.

ittoryu.name: Iai Guard
ittoryu.description: A poised stance that reduces incoming damage briefly.

ittoryu.name: Piercing Tempest
ittoryu.description: A concentrated thrust that pierces heavy armor at cost of user strain.

ittoryu.name: One-Sword Focus
ittoryu.description: Sharpen focus to increase single-sword attack power temporarily.

nitoryu.name: Tora Gari
nitoryu.description: Twin-sword tiger-hunting slash — brutal and direct.

nitoryu.name: Ryuuizan
nitoryu.description: A dual-sword spinning slash that hits multiple angles.

nitoryu.name: Crossing Blades
nitoryu.description: Two blades coordinate to split an opponent's guard.

nitoryu.name: Twin Aegis
nitoryu.description: Use both blades to form a hardened defensive stance.

nitoryu.name: Twin Rush
nitoryu.description: Flowing two-sword footwork to greatly increase strike speed.

nitoryu.name: Tora Finisher
nitoryu.description: A violent, two-sword finishing cleave that overextends the user.

santoryu.name: Onigiri
santoryu.description: Three-sword diagonal cleave — classic Zoro strike.

santoryu.name: Tatsu Maki
santoryu.description: Spiral three-sword tornado that lashes surrounding foes.

santoryu.name: Santoryu Ogi: Sanzen Sekai
santoryu.description: Three Thousand Worlds — devastating three-sword barrage (high recoil).

santoryu.name: Asura
santoryu.description: Fearsome Asura form — multiplies offensive power dramatically.

santoryu.name: Lion Dance
santoryu.description: Three-sword volley focused on brutal, cleaving strikes.

santoryu.name: Three-Blade Guard
santoryu.description: Hardened tri-blade formation that soaks heavy incoming damage.

starkk_guns.name: Garganta Redirect
starkk_guns.description: Open a dimensional throat that redirects incoming force away.

starkk_guns.name: Starkk Volley
starkk_guns.description: Concentrated barrage of rounds — heavy damage with recoil.

starkk_guns.name: Soul Leech Rounds
starkk_guns.description: Special rounds siphon a portion of hit foes' vitality.

gero_gero_gun.name: Sonic Burst
gero_gero_gun.description: Compressed sonic projectile that blasts targets.

gero_gero_gun.name: Gero Crescendo
gero_gero_gun.description: Amplify your strikes with harmonic resonance for massive damage.

gero_gero_gun.name: Echo Barrier
gero_gero_gun.description: A harmonic shield that absorbs and disperses incoming hits.
